channel.description: Recent content in rename on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Rename all files in a folder from upper to lower case.
item.description: Sometimes is needed to have all files in a folder in the same case. Here’s a small script to rename all files in the folder to lower case: for i in *; do mv $i `echo $i | tr [:upper:] [:lower:]`; done
